hero.title: Our History
hero.subtitle: Since our creation, we have been working to become the world reference in the natural stone industry.

story.title: The TEKORA Story
story.content: Founded in 2003 with the vision of revolutionizing the natural stone industry, TEKORA quickly established itself as an undisputed leader. Our journey is marked by a constant quest for excellence and innovation, guided by values of integrity and environmental respect.
story.content2: Over the years, we have developed strategic partnerships with the best quarries in the world, allowing us to offer an unparalleled selection of marbles and natural stones. Our team of experts, trained in traditional techniques as well as the most modern technologies, guarantees impeccable quality at every stage.
story.content3: Today, TEKORA and our premium brand PietraNox equip the most prestigious projects around the world, from luxury private residences to iconic commercial buildings. Our commitment to excellence remains unwavering, and we continue to innovate to shape the future of our industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide the highest quality natural stone solutions while respecting the environment and creating value for our customers, employees, and partners.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the global reference partner for exceptional natural stone projects, recognized for our expertise, innovation, and sustainable commitment.

hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Discover our exceptional range of marbles and natural stones

marble.title: Marbles
marble.description: A collection of noble marbles selected for their exceptional beauty and quality.
marble.longDescription: Our marbles come from the best quarries in Italy, Greece, and Portugal. Each block is meticulously selected by our experts to guarantee unique veins and impeccable quality. Ideal for countertops, wall coverings, and prestigious floors.

granite.title: Granites
granite.description: Resistant and elegant granites for your most demanding projects.
granite.longDescription: Our range of granites combines exceptional durability and refined aesthetics. Resistant to scratches, heat, and daily wear, granite is the ideal choice for professional kitchens, high-traffic commercial spaces, and outdoor applications.

limestone.title: Limestones
limestone.description: Authentic limestones for a timeless style.
limestone.longDescription: Our limestones bring warmth and character to any space. With their natural tones and distinctive texture, they create an elegant Mediterranean atmosphere. Perfect for facades, fireplaces, and prestigious landscaping.

onyx.title: Onyx
onyx.description: Translucent onyx for luminous and sophisticated creations.
onyx.longDescription: Onyx represents the pinnacle of luxury in the natural stone world. Its unique translucency allows for spectacular backlit installations. Each piece is a natural work of art, ideal for bars, accent walls, and distinctive architectural elements.

pietranox.title: PietraNox
pietranox.subtitle: Our Premium Brand
pietranox.description: PietraNox represents the pinnacle of our expertise. Each piece is selected with the greatest care to guarantee impeccable quality.
